SERVING NEW MEXICANS IN WASHINGTON This week, I was proud to join my colleagues in sending a bipartisan letter urging the United States Department of Agriculture (USDA) to increase support for Western farmers and ranchers impacted by drought. As the American West faces a crisis, the USDA should provide federal funds for agriculture conservation equally across the country to reflect the contribution of every region, including the West.
